description:
I'm a Front-End Developer and a software engineering student at University of Waterloo, Canada!
I am actively giving life to my entrepreneurial ideas using my programming skills.
about:
Thank you for visiting my website! My name is Mike Kwak, currently a software engineering student at University of Waterloo in Canada.

I truly know that there is no mountain I cannot conquer if I put my mind to it. No matter how steep and dangerous, with a strategic, brave, determined, and obsessive mindset, I will be on top, searching for bigger mountains to climb.
uniDescription: I am enrolled in a 5 year long curriculum that combines theoretical nowledge, practical skills, and industry experience.
neoDescription: I interned in the web service development team where I deployed and improved my full-stack development skills.
schDescription: I was a student council member and the captain of the school soccer team.
freDescription: I developed online marketing platform for local business during the pandemic.
portfolio: here is some of my work that I've done in various proramming languages.
conDescription: If you have any question, pleas feel free to shoot me an email or fill in the form on the right! Happy Programming!!
